players.name: Alice
memory:
Bob: "I am the detective and I found out Charlie is the mafioso.
"
Bob: "I have identified Charlie as the mafioso. I will continue to investigate and ensure justice is served."
Charlie: "Good morning, everyone. I'm glad we're all safe today."
You: "I'm glad to see everyone is safe as well. Let's work together to catch the mafioso."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
